title: Opening Up the (Back) Door to Anal Pleasure
itunes:title: Opening Up the (Back) Door to Anal Pleasure
itunes:subtitle: Opening Up the (Back) Door to Anal Pleasure
description:
August is Anal Sex Month and in this show, Emily is ushering in the season with special guest author, sexologist and anal sex expert Dr. Charlie Glickman!

 

Dr. Charlie offers expert insight on everything from anal anatomy to buttplug tips to how to locate and effectively stimulating the prostate. He and Emily clear up common misconceptions and straighten out negative stigma surrounding back-door play, and even get into the hot new topic of pegging! How do you bring it up to your partner? What are the ideal positions to make pegging work? Plus, Dr. Charlie walks you through the necessary steps to take to execute the perfect prostate massage!

 

Whether you’re just starting out or are looking to take your rear-end game to the next level, tune in to this Sex With Emily podcast to get the skinny on everything anal.

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
